originalText.text: I was recommended Fernanda by a couple close friends and after hearing their honest and pleasant experiences I knew I had to book. Fernanda made my Brazilian waxing experience wonderful. This was my first Brazilian and she made me feel very comfortable, explained the process and after care and answered any questions I had. Her attention to detail, efficiency, and demeanor are all reasons to book any service. I would highly recommend Fernanda to anyone, particularly first time waxers. I will be a loyal, returning customer!

originalText.text: I was travelling to New York due to business conference and my gel nails got demaged since I left home. I found this place on Google Maps and I liked the reviews and the easy process to book an appointment. My nails were done by Paula Lacerda who is an amazingly nice person and also very precise for her work. I got very nice gel manicure. Clean and nice place, very clean and nice way of making manicure. I‚Äôm glad I found it!

originalText.text: Got my nails done there last night and I‚Äôm still in love with my shiny black nails!! My main thing is to get cuticles taken out and that‚Äôs just what I got! So good! I‚Äôll be back!

originalText.text: TRUST FERNANDA! This was my first time ever having a wax service and I was very nervous about choosing the right place for me. I spent about 2 hours googling places near me and in the city to determine the best fit. I immediately found this place but decided to see my other options. There are definitely a lot to choose from but let me tell you, Fernanda is amazing. She was kind, honest and professional at her craft. She made me feel extremely comfortable and answered every single question I had regarding the process of the waxing. So so so happy with the results! I am scheduled for my second session this week and looking forward to it. If there is any criticism to give, it would be that I was skeptical of the shades not being pulled all the way down in the room BUT once I looked out the window, I noticed that the building across had no view to the inside of the room I was in üòâ Otherwise, the spa was clean and COVID safe as Fernanda was wearing a mask the entire time üëçüèΩ ü§ó

originalText.text: Fernanda is absolutely amazing!  She‚Äôs a true professional ‚Äì her waxing technique is quick and pretty painless.  Beleza spa is clean and Fernanda is lovely and makes you feel super comfortable.  I cannot imagine going anywhere else!
